channel.title: Angry Robot Books
channel.itunes:summary: Join us monthly as we interview authors from Angry Robot Books, a new indie publisher publishing SF, F, and WTF?

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #24 â€“ Interview with Adam Christopher

item.description: This month we talk to Adam Christopher about Russian dopplegangers. As well as his new book, Hang Wire. item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: We’re dropping in some interviews here and there, not official shows, just some chats with some of our authors. The latest is with Emma Newman, author of The Split Worlds series.

item.title: Robot Special Audio: Chuck Wendig Interview â€“ EXPLICIT
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: We’re dropping in some interviews here and there, not official shows, just some chats with some of our authors. Here’s one with Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds, Mockingbird, The Blue Blazes and his most recent Angry Robot book, The Cormorant. There are words here. Bad words. 13 minutes of them. You have been warned.
item.content:encoded:
We’re dropping in some interviews here and there, not official shows, just some chats with some of our authors.

Here’s one with Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds, Mockingbird, The Blue Blazes and his most recent Angry Robot book, The Cormorant.

There are words here. Bad words. 13 minutes of them. You have been warned.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're dropping in some interviews here and there, not official shows, just some chats with some of our authors. - Here's one with Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds, Mockingbird, The Blue Blazes and his most recent Angry Robot book, The Cormorant. -
item.itunes:summary:
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/parental_advisory_T_ex-300x239.png)We're dropping in some interviews here and there, not official shows, just some chats with some of our authors.
Here's one with Chuck Wendig (http://angryrobotbooks.com/our-authors/chuck-wendig/), author of Blackbirds, Mockingbird, The Blue Blazes and his most recent Angry Robot book, The Cormorant.
There are words here. Bad words. 13 minutes of them. You have been warned.

item.title: Robot Special Audio: Ramez Naam Interview
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: Earlier we announced that Nexus by Ramez Naam is shortlisted for a Kitschies Award. Recently, Mur Lafferty had a chat with him. Mez is always worth 10 minutes of your time. Here he talks about the world of Nexus and its sequel, Crux, and the science that informs his work. — Mez is a futurist and has some […]
item.content:encoded:
Earlier we announced that Nexus by Ramez Naam is shortlisted for a Kitschies Award. Recently, Mur Lafferty had a chat with him. Mez is always worth 10 minutes of your time. Here he talks about the world of Nexus and its sequel, Crux, and the science that informs his work.

—

Mez is a futurist and has some fascinating things to say about Artificial Intelligence, nanotech, and the future of mankind.

Here are a couple of great talks he’s given:

Ideas Are Our Greatest Natural Resource (3 mins)

His TEDx talk on Linking Human Brains (14 mins)

 .

And that interview with Mur:
item.itunes:subtitle: Earlier we announced that Nexus by Ramez Naam is shortlisted for a Kitschies Award. Recently, Mur Lafferty had a chat with him. Mez is always worth 10 minutes of your time. Here he talks about the world of Nexus and its sequel, Crux,
item.itunes:summary:
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/Mez-Birthday-2010-Head-enhanced-213x300.jpg)Earlier we announced that Nexus by Ramez Naam is shortlisted for a Kitschies Award (http://angryrobotbooks.com/2014/01/more-awards-love-at-the-kitschies/). Recently, Mur Lafferty had a chat with him. Mez is always worth 10 minutes of your time. Here he talks about the world of Nexus and its sequel, Crux (http://angryrobotbooks.com/books/crux-by-ramez-naam), and the science that informs his work.
---
Mez is a futurist and has some fascinating things to say about Artificial Intelligence, nanotech, and the future of mankind.
Here are a couple of great talks he's given:
Ideas Are Our Greatest Natural Resource (http://bigthink.com/big-think-tv/ideas-are-our-greatest-natural-resource) (3 mins)
His TEDx talk on Linking Human Brains (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9_R-F7z02nY) (14 mins)
.
And that interview with Mur:
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #22 â€“ Wesley Chu Interview
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: We bring you holiday greetings and an interview with Wesley Chu, author of The Lives of Tao and the newly released sequel The Deaths of Tao! Don’t forget to read Wesley’s Christmas blog post, and get his ebooks for just one shiny new pound! (or about US $1.30)
item.content:encoded:
We bring you holiday greetings and an interview with Wesley Chu, author of The Lives of Tao and the newly released sequel The Deaths of Tao!

Don’t forget to read Wesley’s Christmas blog post, and get his ebooks for just one shiny new pound! (or about US $1.30)
item.itunes:subtitle: We bring you holiday greetings and an interview with Wesley Chu, author of The Lives of Tao and the newly released sequel The Deaths of Tao! - Don't forget to read Wesley's Christmas blog post, and get his ebooks for just one shiny new pound!
item.itunes:summary:
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/TheDeathsOfTao-144dpi.jpg)We bring you holiday greetings and an interview with Wesley Chu (http://angryrobotbooks.com/our-authors/wesley-chu/), author of The Lives of Tao and the newly released sequel The Deaths of Tao!
Don't forget to read Wesley's Christmas blog post (http://angryrobotbooks.com/2013/12/wesley-chu-christmas-blog/), and get his ebooks for just one shiny new pound! (or about US $1.30)
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #21 â€“ Freya Robertson
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: This month we roused New Zealand author Freya Robertson out of bed to discuss her new book, Heartwood. Thanks for being a good 5am sport, Freya! Don’t forget to read Freya’s blog!
item.content:encoded:
This month we roused New Zealand author Freya Robertson out of bed to discuss her new book, Heartwood. Thanks for being a good 5am sport, Freya!

Don’t forget to read Freya’s blog!

Don't forget to read Freya's blog (http://www.freyarobertson.com/)!

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #19 â€“ Interview with Adam Christopher and Chuck Wendig
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: Last month, WorldCon played host to several Angry Robot authors, and I was able to sit down with Chuck Wendig and Adam Christopher to talk about their new books. We also brainstormed the next books they will be writing. Listen to find out. Not for kids.
item.content:encoded:
Last month, WorldCon played host to several Angry Robot authors, and I was able to sit down with Chuck Wendig and Adam Christopher to talk about their new books. We also brainstormed the next books they will be writing. Listen to find out.

Not for kids.
item.itunes:subtitle: Last month, WorldCon played host to several Angry Robot authors, and I was able to sit down with Chuck Wendig and Adam Christopher to talk about their new books. We also brainstormed the next books they will be writing. Listen to find out. -
item.itunes:summary:
Last month, WorldCon played host to several Angry Robot authors, and I was able to sit down with Chuck Wendig and Adam Christopher to talk about their new books. We also brainstormed the next books they will be writing. Listen to find out.
Not for kids.
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/SevenWonders-144dpi.jpg)(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/Mockingbird-72dpi-198x300.jpg)
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #18 â€“ Interview with Madeline Ashby
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: We’re back with a live intro with Lee Harris at WorldCon, and an interview with Madeline Ashby, the author of vN, out last month from Angry Robot! We bowled at WorldCon. It wasn’t pretty. Read a sample of vN here!
item.content:encoded:
We’re back with a live intro with Lee Harris at WorldCon, and an interview with Madeline Ashby, the author of vN, out last month from Angry Robot!

We bowled at WorldCon. It wasn’t pretty.

Read a sample of vN here!
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back with a live intro with Lee Harris at WorldCon, and an interview with Madeline Ashby, the author of vN, out last month from Angry Robot! - We bowled at WorldCon. It wasn't pretty. - Read a sample of vN here!
item.itunes:summary:
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/vN-144dpi-198x300.jpg)We're back with a live intro with Lee Harris at WorldCon, and an interview with Madeline Ashby, the author of vN (http://angryrobotbooks.com/our-authors/madeline-ashby/vn-madeline-ashby/), out last month from Angry Robot!
We bowled at WorldCon. It wasn't pretty.
Read a sample of vN here! (http://angryrobotbooks.com/our-authors/madeline-ashby/vn-madeline-ashby/)
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #17 â€“ Interview with Chuck Wendig
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: This month we talk to the shrinking, fragile flower that is Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds. This show is not for kids. Seriously. Might not be for some adults, too. Did we mention it’s explicit? Don’t forget to read Chuck’s blog, Terrible Minds!
item.content:encoded:
This month we talk to the shrinking, fragile flower that is Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds. This show is not for kids. Seriously. Might not be for some adults, too.

Did we mention it’s explicit?

Don’t forget to read Chuck’s blog, Terrible Minds!
item.itunes:subtitle: This month we talk to the shrinking, fragile flower that is Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds. This show is not for kids. Seriously. Might not be for some adults, too. - Did we mention it's explicit? - Don't forget to read Chuck's blog, Terrible Minds!
item.itunes:summary:
(http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/Blackbirds-144dpi-197x300.jpg)This month we talk to the shrinking, fragile flower that is Chuck Wendig, author of Blackbirds. This show is not for kids. Seriously. Might not be for some adults, too.
Did we mention it's explicit?
Don't forget to read Chuck's blog, Terrible Minds (http://terribleminds.com/ramble/blog/)!
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books

item.title: Angry Robot Podcast #16
item.dc:creator: Mur
item.description: We welcome back Matt Forbeck to the show to talk about his historical horror, Carpathia. We also remind you of the Angry Robot and Strange Chemistry Open Door 2012, and encourage you to read the guidelines!
item.content:encoded: We welcome back Matt Forbeck to the show to talk about his historical horror, Carpathia. We also remind you of the Angry Robot and Strange Chemistry Open Door 2012, and encourage you to read the guidelines!
item.itunes:subtitle: We welcome back Matt Forbeck to the show to talk about his historical horror, Carpathia. We also remind you of the Angry Robot and Strange Chemistry Open Door 2012, and encourage you to read the guidelines!
item.itunes:summary: (http://angryrobotbooks.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Carpathia-72dpi-198x300.jpg)We welcome back Matt Forbeck to the show to talk about his historical horror, Carpathia. We also remind you of the Angry Robot and Strange Chemistry Open Door 2012 (http://angryrobotbooks.com/2012/04/open-door-2012-starts-tomorrow/), and encourage you to read the guidelines!
item.itunes:author: Angry Robot Books
